attributes.action: Ensure all trains complete the whole journey on its' respective line
attributes.additional_details: I have constantly asked on Twitter to those lines and there have been no valid response to this query. There is no reason to stop a few stations before the end of the line, complete the whole journey of the line and make everyone's lives more convenient.
attributes.background: Change the tube system so trains do not terminate a few stations before the end of the line. For e.g, some Eastbound Jubilee Trains stop at West Ham, some Westbound Central Line trains stop at Ruislip Gardens instead of completing the whole line. Make a stop to this and make commuters' life easier.

rejection.details: The issues you raise are the responsibility of Transport for London, whose contact details can be found here: https://tfl.gov.uk/help-and-contact/
